SENSES.SENSE: a piece of evidence that something is happening or that something exists<font color=blue> ex: Looking back now, I realize I failed to spot the warning signs. </font>
a written symbol that has a particular meaning, such as % meaning "percent" or $ meaning "dollar"<font color=blue> ex: a multiplication/division sign </font>

a movement or sound that you make that tells other people what you want, how you feel, what they should do, etc.<font color=blue> ex: He turned and gave the familiar thumbs-up sign to the crowd. </font>
a star sign<font color=blue> ex: I'm a Scorpio. What's your sign? </font>
a flat object with words or pictures on it, put in a public place to provide information or advertise something<font color=blue> ex: Several people were ignoring the no-smoking sign. </font>
